===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[cathartical|Cathartical]] ''[[w:Materia medica|materia medica]]'' in [[traditional Chinese medicine]]. This term refers to herbs and other medicinal substances that are used as [[purgative]]s or [[laxative]]s.

====Hyponyms====
{{rel-top|hyponyms}}

攻下藥 (purgatives for cartharsis)

* [[番瀉葉]], ''flower of the the ''[[Senna]]''
* [[芒硝]], ''[[natrii sulfas]] (a naturally occurring mineral)''
* [[大黃]], ''root and rhizome of the ''[[Rheum]]''
* [[蘆薈]], [[aloe vera]]

潤下藥 (purgatives for laxation)
* [[大麻仁]],[[火麻仁]], seed of the [[hemp]]
* [[郁李仁]], ''seed of the ''[[Prunus]]''

峻下藥 (purgatives for drastic hydragogue)
* [[牽牛子]], ''seed of the ''{{taxlink|Pharbitis|genus|noshow=1}}''
* [[芫花]], ''flower of the ''{{taxlink|Daphne genkwa|species|noshow=1}}
* [[甘遂]], ''root of the ''{{taxlink|Euphorbia kansui|species|noshow=1}}
* [[大戟]], ''root of the ''{{taxlink|Euphorbia pekinensis|species|noshow=1}}

峻下逐水藥
* [[千金子]]
* [[商陸]]
* [[巴豆]]
